Structs/NACCWatchComplication.html#/s:20.name: body
Structs/NACCWatchComplication.html#/s:20.abstract: This returns a view for the complication.

Structs/NACCWatchComplicationEntryView.h.name: _family
Structs/NACCWatchComplicationEntryView.h.abstract: This is the display family variant for this complication.

Structs/NACCWatchComplicationEntryView.h.name: entry
Structs/NACCWatchComplicationEntryView.h.abstract: The timeline entry to be displayed by this view.

Structs/NACCWatchComplicationEntryView.h.name: body
Structs/NACCWatchComplicationEntryView.h.abstract: We deliver different views, depending on the family.

Structs/NACCWatchComplicationEntry.html#.name: family
Structs/NACCWatchComplicationEntry.html#.abstract: This is the display family variant for this complication.

Structs/NACCWatchComplicationEntry.html#.name: image
Structs/NACCWatchComplicationEntry.html#.abstract: The image to be displayed (based upon the family)

Structs/NACCWatchComplicationEntry.html#.name: text
Structs/NACCWatchComplicationEntry.html#.abstract: The text to be displayed (based upon the family)

Structs/NACCWatchComplicationProvider.ht.name: _family
Structs/NACCWatchComplicationProvider.ht.abstract: This is the display family variant for this complication.

Structs/NACCWatchComplicationProvider.ht.name: getSnapshot(in:completion:)
Structs/NACCWatchComplicationProvider.ht.abstract: This sends a “live” snapshot to the completion.

Structs/NACCWatchComplicationProvider.ht.name: getTimeline(in:completion:)
Structs/NACCWatchComplicationProvider.ht.abstract: This returns a full timeline entry. We make sure to flush the prefs before returning.

Classes/NACCPersistentPrefs/MainWatchSta.name: text
Classes/NACCPersistentPrefs/MainWatchSta.abstract: Only display the text report of the cleantime.

Classes/NACCPersistentPrefs/MainWatchSta.name: medallion
Classes/NACCPersistentPrefs/MainWatchSta.abstract: Only display the highest achieved keytag (if less than a year), or the last medallion (if a year or more).

Classes/NACCPersistentPrefs/Keys.html#/s.name: cleanDate
Classes/NACCPersistentPrefs/Keys.html#/s.abstract: This stores the cleandate, as an instance of Date

Classes/NACCPersistentPrefs/Keys.html#/s.name: lastSelectedTabIndex
Classes/NACCPersistentPrefs/Keys.html#/s.abstract: This stores the last selected tab index (0-based).

Classes/NACCPersistentPrefs/Keys.html#/s.name: allKeys
Classes/NACCPersistentPrefs/Keys.html#/s.abstract: These are all the keys, in an Array of String.

Classes/NACCPersistentPrefs/Keys.html.name: Keys
Classes/NACCPersistentPrefs/Keys.html.abstract: This is an enumeration that will list the prefs keys for us.

Classes/NACCPersistentPrefs/MainWatchSta.name: MainWatchState
Classes/NACCPersistentPrefs/MainWatchSta.abstract: Choose which of the states to display in the main screen of the Watch app. The secondary screen will always be a keytag list.

Classes/NACCPersistentPrefs.html#/s:20Co.name: keys
Classes/NACCPersistentPrefs.html#/s:20Co.abstract: This is a list of the keys for our prefs.

Classes/NACCPersistentPrefs.html#/s:20Co.name: cleanDate
Classes/NACCPersistentPrefs.html#/s:20Co.abstract: This stores the cleandate, as an instance of Date

Classes/NACCPersistentPrefs.html#/s:20Co.name: lastSelectedTabIndex
Classes/NACCPersistentPrefs.html#/s:20Co.abstract: This stores the last selected tab index (0-based).

Classes/NACCPersistentPrefs.html#/s:20Co.name: watchAppDisplayState
Classes/NACCPersistentPrefs.html#/s:20Co.abstract: This is set and read by the Watch app. It is not accessed by any of the other targets.

Classes/NACCPersistentPrefs.html#/c:@M@C.name: init()
Classes/NACCPersistentPrefs.html#/c:@M@C.abstract: We just make sure that we use the shared group for our prefs.

Classes/NACCPersistentPrefs.html.name: NACCPersistentPrefs
Classes/NACCPersistentPrefs.html.abstract: This is the subclass of the preferences type that will provide our persistent app settings.

Global%20Variables.html.name: Global Variables
Global%20Variables.html.abstract: The following global variables are available globally.
